name: The Experiment (itch) (katbonbailey)
description:
Arthur wakes confused. He's not sure where he is... or even who he is. Is a doctor? A scientist? Has something terrible happened to him? Play the game and get lost in THE EXPERIMENT.

This is my first Twine interactive story. A big thank you to my husband of https://brainjar.itch.io/ for making the cover art.
